EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2017-4-04-Live Demo Series UK.Promotion #1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Have you considered your public cloud journey?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/operations-manager-live-demo-series/]]> {{Lead.First Name}}
Turbonomic is launching a live demo series, where we will discuss how Turbonomic enables you to deliver performance to your business and customers. Each webinar will cover how we fit into specific scenarios and provide you with the tools to address industry challenges.
Our first topic is Top 3 Things to Consider On-Prem Before Moving to the Public Cloud to be held on Tuesday, April 4 at 12 PM GMT and Thursday, April 6 at 2 PM GMT.
In this webinar we will address the common challenges and questions to consider on your hybrid cloud journey related to sizing/cost, workload dependencies and governance.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/operations-manager-live-demo-series/]]>
